option.name: template
description
option.value: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

option.name: description
option.value: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

option.name: description
option.value: A code change that improves performance

option.name: description
option.value: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

option.name: description
option.value: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

option.name: description
option.value: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)

option.name: description
option.value: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
